exec: _isContains(json[key], keyname, value) : key === keyname && json[key] === value;

body.raw:
{
    "api_metadata": {
        "protocol": "http",
        "url": "/shopapi",
        "cookie": "JSESSIONID",
        "hostname": "*",
        "cookie_idle_timeout": "200m",
        "logout_api_enabled": false,
        "cookie_persistence_enabled": false,
        "login_url": "/shopapi/login",
        "oauth2_access_token": false,
        "apikey_qs": "",
        "apikey_header": "MyAPIKey",
        "enable_blocking": true,
        "api_mapping": {
            "internal_url": "/app"
        },
        "api_pattern_enforcement": {
            "protocol_allowed": "",
            "http_redirect": {
                "response_code": "",
                "response_def": "",
                "https_url": ""
            },
            "methods_allowed": [
                "GET",
                "PUT",
                "POST",
                "DELETE",
                "HEAD"
            ],
            "content_type_allowed": "application/text",
            "error_code": "401",
            "error_def": "Unauthorized",
            "error_message_body": "401 Unauthorized"
        },
        "flow_control": {
            "client_spike_threshold": "500/second",
            "server_connection_queueing": false
        },
        "api_memory_size": "128mb",
        "health_check": true,
        "health_check_interval": 60,
        "health_retry_count": 4,
        "health_url": "/app/home",
        "server_ssl": false,
        "servers": [
            {
                "host": "3.85.169.62",
                "port": 4100,
                "server_connection_quota": 4500,
                "server_spike_threshold": "200/second"
            },
            {
                "host": "10.96.2.31",
                "port": 4200,
                "server_connection_quota": 4500,
                "server_spike_threshold": "200/second"
            }
        ],
        "decoy_config": {
            "decoy_enabled": true,
            "response_code": 200,
            "response_def": "200 OK",
            "response_message": "200 OK",
            "decoy_subpaths": [
                "/shopapi/online",
                "/shopapi/offline"
            ]
         },
        "username_header": "x-username-header"
    }
}
